name: Lights Out
description: Blessed by the light, Soona is the last hope of Jiruho. With might and agility, she has to face the dark forces and traps of the Netherworld to save her people from the apocalypse. She will venture inside the cityâ€™s temples to recover the fragments of the sacred mirror.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 - 4590 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD R9 290 or NVIDIA GTX 770 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: X360 controller NEEDED
